played since release this sucks and is a cash grab parading the corpse of a beloved game around

Well, I'm not a fan of it's current state but I also need to acknowledge that this is the game that kept me coming back to it for 7 years. Apex, didn't hook me that much cuz it's br, TF2 has no competitive playerbase and the casual games are just chaos which is not my cup of tea( tf2 with official competitive mm with proper structure AND PLAYERBASE would slap so hard), the only thing that has a good competitive scene is csgo but i want a hero shooter (valorant sucks balls), basically my only option is this game. At least I don't have to launch b.net anymore (except for diablo and old cods i suppose).
To quote movie critic Jay Sherman: "It stinks!"

ã€‚

cat

Once upon a time, I had a cat, I had ten dollars, I would buy it food for eight dollars, bathe it often, and it was very sticky to me.

Later, I took it out to play, passers-by thought it was cute, they fed it cat food, ham sausage, I was very unhappy because it was mine. I wanted to carry it home, but he broke away from me and meowed at the person who gave it good food, I hugged him a few times and he didn't go with me, and scratched me, so I turned around and left.....

Later, I came across it by chance on the road, and it was dirty. Passers-by will only give it good food and play with it, but they will not take it home and bathe it. It saw me and followed me home, I shut it out, it meowed outside the door, it was very uncomfortable,
but I wouldn't want it anymore
.

This game is the only reason I returned to playing FPS after a long break. It looks great, the game play is dynamic (and sometimes frustrating), but win or lose I want to play again and again.  I like a lot of changes they have made in the launch of Season 6 and even with a few newly introduced bugs, I know those will go away and the game is going to be in a pretty good place in my opinion.

This one's gonna be the longest review i've ever written so let's begin with the pros and get that out of the way:

[h1] PROS: [/h1]

-The game is getting updated now that the team is no longer split and more "frequent" balance patches averaging twice per season
-The audio design is still something to note as it's easier to notify what ability is being used so you can act on it
-The community has a hardcore porn scene and foot fetish if you're into that

[i] That's all i can say as most of the pros have slowly faded away sadly [/i]

[h1] CONS: [/h1]

[u] Story [/u]
The game has not been known for its brilliant story back in overwatch 1 but it had some semblance of one but acti-blizzard is not known for consistent a consistent story when it came to overwatch's lore

-More often than not any sort of world building the community can create will be squashed by blizzard simply saying "nuh uh actually" and layer another shallow character above another with another lost opportunity of world building.
[list]
    [*]People used to think their squeaky clean mercy was actually somehow secretly a risky doctor whose practices may have had horrible side effects with her operations with reaper. Nope she's just a perfect character who likes cake and the one that did all that horrible stuff and testing was actually moira our disney supervillain who's anything but morally good!
    [*]Soldier 76 was known as that classic call of duty character who's a rebel fighting for his own sense of justice at the cost of his own safety who left behind his own family. Sorry man due to a controversy we're going to fabricate our own "controversy" by making him gay and layered on a poor retcon making him gay after 3 years of established story, here's your representation fellow gays sorry about that dishonorable hong kong mention china!
    [*]Characters like sigma are slept on with insane and complex characters but they were considered in poor taste as they were seen as malicious towards people with mental illnesses which was the point of sigma, he was an ill man being taken advantage of by an evil organization! So they toned him down and just made him an elder care patient who's just not all there
    [*]Every character who could've made a cool concept via the story hasn't had anything built upon their story since their own launch.
    [*]The newer characters just seem too smug and perfect, souljourn and kiriko seem to be ham fisted into the lore and feel like "Original characters donut steel" and can't have any flaws besides "lmao i like pastries too much tee hee", at least junker queen has some more in depth flaws and some more well thought out trauma if that one short cinematic counts.
[/list]

Overall the story is constantly changing to either add a unique concept on the surface and forget about it or use lgbt characters to hide from criticism and can call their critics homophobic.

[u] Gameplay [/u]

[list]
    [*] The gameplay is pretty clean however since overwatch 2 came around things have gotten increasingly buggier despite having their full team on the game, some chock it up to the lack of playtesting and rushed development.
    [*] In the event the community finds cool tech or glitches that raise the skill ceiling of the players the balancing team immediately removes it as they strictly want you to play the way they intended you to play with no straying from the path so there's 1 or 2 ways to play a character (i.e look at old genji techs for example)
    [*] Matchmaking has always been a mess in this type of game you might get paired with a thrower, smurf, or just the average toxic player because they can't work with you. You don't have a choice with your team and you don't see the person again due to the lack of a rematch or staying in the same server as the teams. 
    [*]The one thing everyone has spoken about so it doesn't need much of an introduction, the team throwing out the pve up half baked or rather fucking raw instead of promising us the pve will come later with all the intended features as they were shown to have it fully created. Don't pay for that half assed pve it will be as good as the prior pve missions where you play it twice and the magic and fun is gone.
    [*] New gamemodes are only based around skins they're made as a lackluster showcase to sell you on the skins that half won't even be in the paid battlepass, you have to pay and find them in the "Rotational store"
    [*] Forced 50/50 win loss rate whether true or not most the community believes it due to the matchmaking for competitive players, you do well so they pair you up with players who have significantly better coordination and mechanical skill and you lose because you can't keep up. You then are plopped into a competitive match where your team doesn't know how to press mouse 1. Even players who've been used to this gameplay loop even today still believe in "elo hell" where you'll always lose more than win despite their efforts.
     [*]They're also too afraid to balance characters that have been oppressive for weeks if not months. Souljourn was constantly getting damage boosted due to her ability to one shot kill 75% of the cast with her abilities and they refuse to remove her headshot multiplier with it and instead nerf poor mercy again. Some theorize it's to keep sales up on bundles and battlepasses because she's on it.
     [*] New characters in this game came with so far bloated kits that they seem like 3 characters in one compared to old boy mcree who just has [b] gun [/b] like kiriko who can do everything at once deal crazy damage (albeit skill based so that's positive), cleanse every debuff, some minor cc (in the form of suzu knockback but it's lackluster),  and provide healing, provide the best buffs speed and fire rate increase, wall climb, teleport, small hitbox. Souljourn has a kit that does everything at once, insane damage at long and close range, a get out of jail free ability which is the best in the game for dps class and an annoyingly small hitbox. Ramattra albeit a cool guy but he has the biggest set of abilities in the game if they haven't toppled his record with a newer character by now.
    [*] So much visual clutter that you'll have a better understanding of moon runes than what is happening during team fights.
    [*] They remove so much content to combat toxicity when the gameplay is so aggravating in the first place but hey at least you can't spam voice lines, sprays, text chat, voice chat anymore! 
    [*] New characters voice directions are always too smug nowadays besides lifeweaver for some reason you just hate hearing them. 
[/list]

The gameplay loop of this game is too brutally frustrating for the players and it's one of the sole reasons why players are the most toxic in gaming despite their sole duty to prevent it.

[u] Monetization [/u]

[list]
    [*] The battlepass was forced on us after acti-blizzard couldn't exploit lootboxes due to lawmakers cracking down on it they settled with a battlepass to exploit their players more while also giving players a disadvantage for not buying it!
    [*] The battlepass typically has items that most players don't want, who gives a shit about souvenirs, sprays, nametag banners and icons when they just want skins and the new character that is locked behind a battlepass!
    [*] Players won't get access to the new character until they hit tier 30 (if they finally move it to be easier or stopped doing that entirely)
    [*] The content in the battlepass is also the classic "Fear Of Missing Out" or FOMO for short where if you don't complete the battlepass the content inside it will never come back so the players psychologically would be pressured to invest their time and effort to finish
    [*] F2P users can barely earn anything now that free lootboxes upon levels are gone, you gotta pay 15$ for that one skin you wanted!
[/list]

I've hit the letter limit on this review but if i could say more i would ;-;

[h1]Shameless PALADINS ripoff! [/h1]

This small indie company Blazzerd just made a ripoff of an incredible game PALADINS that was available since may of 2018 and was critically acclaimed by 85% positive user rating. 
As you see this Overwhat game with 22% approval is really really far from reaching that Paladins unshakable position. 

They stole everything mechanics, game mode, even characters!  

Remember [b]Androuxus [/b] in Paladins? What a cool and memorable character! In Overwatch they made two characters based on Androxus! His look is used to create a character, which they named in the most cliche way - The Reaper... Wow... Very creative. 
And they stole gameplay and mechanics from Androxus to create a [b] COWBOY character with unremarkable name Cassidy [/b]. Do they even have a bit of fantasy?! Even I can come up with better name! For example... McCree! Sounds much cooler, right?

The only thing they could not copy is the horses! - I guess it is too advanced for them. 

The monetization in the game is awful! You need to buy characters and all suits costs like good indie games on Steam that people actually put efford in. 

Remember Paladins collab with RWBY? The developers actually made the new, unique skins to represent characters from the show. In Uverwatch, they had collab with One punch man, and they just repainted the suit of one of the characters - Kiriko, and added her a new hair. Wow! 25 dollars please and no regional prices! Cheers love, the monetization is here!

Anyway guys, I don't know what else to say. You see that Avengerswatch has 22% positive rating while the remarkable, unbeaten Paladins has 85% positive rating! 
So just go and play better game!..
.
.
